definition: tip
wine (esp. rice wine)/liquor/spirits/alcoholic beverage/CL:杯[bei1],瓶[ping2],罐[guan4],桶[tong3],缸[gang1]
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
surname Qian

sentences.english: Peter is a black sheep of his family. He sold his house for drinking.
sentences.chinese: 皮特真是個敗家子，賣了房子換酒錢。

sentences.english: You can chalk the drinks up to my account.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把酒錢記到我的帳上。

sentences.english: She says she attributes it to the "beer money" being handed out by BP.
sentences.chinese: 她說可能是英石油給的酒錢太多，大家把身體喝壞了。

sentences.english: Zhou Lijun laughed, dropped the drinks and the card away.
sentences.chinese: 周立軍笑了，扔下了酒錢和那張名片就走了。

sentences.english: I've never known him (to) pay for a drink.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒見他付過酒錢。

sentences.english: Please charge the bill to my tab.
sentences.chinese: 請你把酒錢記在我的賬上。

sentences.english: They also paid for the liquor.
The waiter made a mistake when he added the wine twice.
sentences.chinese: 服務員錯把酒錢多加了一次。

sentences.english: Could you put it one my tab, please?
sentences.chinese: 請把酒錢記在我的帳上好嗎？

sentences.english: You call, heads or tails? That will decide who pays for the drinks.
sentences.chinese: 你說，是正面還是反面？那將決定誰付酒錢。

sentences.english: Let's go halves in buying the wine.

definition: half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
grand dreams/unrealistic ideas (idiom)
mechanical pencil/propelling pencil
pickpocket
No flower can bloom for a hundred days./Good times do not last long. (idiom)
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
to ask a question, already knowing the answer
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: exceptionally intelligent (idiom)
cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party
to make a fool of oneself
butcher's shop
long-cherished wish
